name: Poe.trade.assist
body:
useful assistant for using poe.trade

![poetradeassist1](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/75921/11021033/79778200-866f-11e5-889c-9d588b897198.png)

* save your searches for easier access
* name your searches
* useful for checking offline items if they're online now
* a thousand times faster search speed

***
_poe.trade.assist is fan made tool and is not affiliated with Grinding Gear Games in any way._

_100% free and open source under GPLv2 license_
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
